author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Flamzer is the second of the Series 4 Mixels of the Infernites Tribe.

Flamzer seems like a little fiery demon. His articulation is primarily from clips, the only ball&sockets are for his big flamey tail.

There are a good variety of parts in this tribes red, dark red and tr.orange colours. A good selection of clips and bars. The big flame piece is 'cool' and useful.

Quick build time a little under 4 minutes, including a Nixel.

He's the least interesting Mixel of the Infernite tribe, with the least articulation. There are good parts in the set though.
